attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Hospital car parking for out-patience, visitors and Hospital staff have become a major proplem to us all. To solve the problem please join us to encourage the government to spread current daily outpatient appointment times, over a longer period i.e. 10 hours each day instead of the present 8 hours.
attributes.creator_name: Mr J R N James & Mrs M James
